TextLibrary.Text: KIRINE
So you're the lucky one. What's your name?
So you're the lucky one. What's your name?
Kirine. Kirine Thwaites. And what do you mean 'lucky ONE'?
Kirine. Kirine Thwaites. And what do you mean 'lucky ONE'?
You're the only survivor we've found. What happened here?
You're the only survivor we've found. What happened here?
I... I have no idea...
I... I have no idea...
What? You mean you can't remember?
What? You mean you can't remember?
No... I remember. But... well... it was just chaos. People were running everywhere. There was shooting. I headed for the escape pod.
No... I remember. But... well... it was just chaos. People were running everywhere. There was shooting. I headed for the escape pod.
It looks like something broke loose. What were you keeping in here?
It looks like something broke loose. What were you keeping in here?
I don't know.
I don't know.
You don't KNOW? How could you not know? You worked here, didn't you?
You don't KNOW? How could you not know? You worked here, didn't you?
I did, but I worked in the tech-division. I wasn't allowed to know what the bio-division was up to.
I did, but I worked in the tech-division. I wasn't allowed to know what the bio-division was up to.
Hrmmm... well you'd best come with us for now. We'll try to get you back to Serpens Prime eventually. Not that it seems you have anything to tell them.
Hrmmm... well you'd best come with us for now. We'll try to get you back to Serpens Prime eventually. Not that it seems you have anything to tell them.
